aiCard.morningDesc: Your mood tends to be higher on days you log before 10 AM. A consistent morning check-in could help.
aiCard.trendDesc: Your average mood has improved over the past two weeks. Keep up the great work!
aiCard.selfCareDesc: Weekends show lower activity. Consider setting a gentle reminder to check in with yourself.

This will permanently delete your account and all associated data:

• All mood entries and notes
• All custom triggers
• All session data

This action cannot be undone.

items.q1: How do I log my mood?
items.a1: Tap the "+" button on the home screen, select your mood level (1–5), add optional notes and triggers, then tap "Log Mood" to save.
items.a2: Triggers are activities or events that may affect your mood. You can select from default triggers (Work, Sleep, Exercise, etc.) or create custom ones that are personal to you.
items.q3: How do I view my mood history?
items.a3: Go to the History tab to see a calendar view of your moods. Tap any day to see your entries for that date.
items.a4: Yes! Go to Profile → Export Data. You can export as JSON or CSV format, which will be saved to your device.
items.a5: Insights are based on your mood entries over time. We analyze your average mood, distribution, and trigger patterns to show you meaningful trends.
items.a6: Absolutely. Your mood notes are encrypted end-to-end. We never share your personal data with third parties.
items.q7: How do I delete my account?
items.a7: Go to Profile, scroll to the bottom, and tap "Delete Account". This will permanently remove all your data and cannot be undone.
items.a8: The community lets you share mood updates anonymously, join support groups, and connect with others on their emotional wellness journey.

backupSync.title: Backup & Sync
backupSync.encryptedDesc: Your mood notes are encrypted with AES-256-GCM before leaving your device. Only you can read them.
backupSync.automaticDesc: Your data syncs automatically whenever you have an internet connection. No action needed.
backupSync.crossDeviceDesc: Sign in on any device to access your mood history and settings instantly.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptySubtitle: When someone likes or comments on your posts, you'll see it here.

errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
